content: imp approximately 14 5 in from horn to toe 37 cm scalable using different hooks and yarns requires working in the round and sewing with optional embroidery i m very new to actually publishing patterns as opposed to just writing them for myself so any feedback is appreciated this little guy is one of my favorites to make and all of my friends have one at this point - in fact the one made for the pattern is number six he is a bit customizable and can have a variety of motifs at the end of his tail but the one given in the pattern is a diamond/square materials hook size g - 4 25 mm yarn weight - aran/8 wpi in 3 colors color a - most used color color b - used more for accents color c - used primarily for embroidery optional if desired eyes of choice - i use fancy buttons stuffing of choice scissors tapestry needle terminology american increase - 2 single_crochet in one stitch decrease - this can be any decrease of choice i use an invisible decrease sl - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet tc - triple crochet ___ - stitches that are repeated _ - stitch count at the end of the round body start with color a row 1 single_crochet 6 in mc 6 row 2 increase 6 times 12 row 3 single_crochet increase 6 times 18 row 4 single_crochet 2 increase 6 times 24 row 5 single_crochet 3 increase 6 times 30 row 6-20 single_crochet 30 i would recommend marking between row 11 and 12 to mark where the top of the legs will be row 21 single_crochet 3 decrease 6 times 24 row 22 single_crochet 2 decrease 6 times 18 row 23 single_crochet decrease 6 times 12 switch to color b row 24 single_crochet chain 11 turn sl single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 tc 3 skip next stitch on round single_crochet 4 times row 25 single_crochet double_crochet in skipped stitch single_crochet 4 times 12 row 26-28 single_crochet around 12 tie off leaving a long tail for sewing stuff body firmly stuff neck lightly head make 1 in color a and 1 in color b row 1 single_crochet 4 in mc turn 4 row 2 increase 4 times turn 8 row 3 single_crochet increase 4 times turn 12 row 4 single_crochet 2 increase 4 times turn 16 row 5-7 single_crochet 16 turn row 8 single_crochet 2 decrease 4 times turn 12 row 9-10 single_crochet 12 turn row 11 single_crochet decrease 4 times turn 8 row 12-14 single_crochet 8 turn row 15 decrease 4 times turn 4 row 16-18 single_crochet 4 turn row 19 decrease twice 2 tie off horns make 1 in color a and 1 in color b row 1 single_crochet 4 in mc 4 row 2-3 single_crochet 4 row 4 single_crochet increase twice 6 row 5-6 single_crochet 6 row 7 single_crochet 2 increase twice 8 row 8-9 single_crochet 8 row 10 single_crochet increase 4 times
